extendedInfo.description: ***Editor Picked by AppEggs.com.***ALL NEW COMPLETELY REDESIGNED APP! Â Now 135.2% easier to use and 3,011% more eye candy.As always, 100% FREE TO PLAY.Over 7 million registered players and counting! Â Yeah, that's right - we've got more players than people in Sydney, Australia (although Sydney has more kangaroos).Why play just one bingo game when you can play 3? Â What's that? 3 bingo games? In one app?HECK YEAH!Lucky Bingo is the only bingo app to feature 3 completely unique and cool games of bingo.Â LIVE ACTION BINGOThe multiplayer bingo you know and love. Â Chat with other players, level up, unlock 11 different rooms with varying bets and prize pools.Pretty cool, right. Â But that's not all.BAM! Â We've got...Â BINGO HELL Â The most devilish bingo game since Creation. Â If you don't win, the prize pool rolls over. And rolls over again. And again. So when you do win, you win BIG. Â Scratch that - you win GIGANTIC. Â If you can stand the HEAT.Wait, there's more.Other bingo games let you buy 2 cards. Â Maybe 4 cards if they're feeling generous. Â Lucky Bingo's Live Action Bingo lets you buy 100 cards. Â That's 25 to 50 times the cards of other bingo games. Â How many cards do you think Beyonce buys when she plays bingo? Â 4 cards? No way, man. Â 100 all the way.*And Live Action Bingo features in-game chat - scope out the competition, schmooze with friends, or engage in some friendly trash-talking!PAINFULLY SLOW BINGOOur free jackpot daily bingo game. Â We call just a few numbers... and only once a day. Â Check in every day to play for free. Â Test your nerves and your luck. Â For big jackpots!That should be enough, right? Â Not for Lucky Bingo. Â We've also got...INSTANT BINGOGet that slot machine buzz â by playing single player bingo! Â Bet what you want and see how you did, in seconds. Â Knock out a dozen games of Instant Bingo in less than a minute. Â That's better than waiting minutes to play two cards in those other bingo apps.PLUSâ¦Get your free Daily Bonus coins (and get an extra Daily Bonus for each Facebook friend playing); level up and earn additional bonuses; send gifts; and more!BOTTOM LINE?Based on player feedback, Lucky Bingo has been redesigned from the ground up to be better looking, more responsive and easier to play.*Weâre not positive that Beyonce plays bingo. Â But we feel confident that if she did, she would play LuckyBingo. And 100 cards all the way!

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: This app would br awesome if it didn\'t freeze and stall out so much. The idea of a week long bingo game is cool, if you can get into it. I\'ve had the app for about an hour and have had it freeze up about ten times.
reviews.author: Laurel Jones

reviews.title: No game to play?
reviews.comment: The only game I get is called painfully slow bingo. It doesn\'t start until noon tomorrow. What is the deal here?
reviews.author: Jeani Kemper

reviews.comment: Let\'s me play but then says it can\'t connect to internet. All my other internet games are working, very frustrating please fix!
reviews.author: Harley Honey

reviews.comment: The game still freezes EVERY time I play.  My cache is clear, my phone is clear.  Your game sucks!\tYou lose all money and everything earned during game due to freeze ups.  Have lost millions from game freezing.  Game TOTALLY SUCKS!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Stodghill

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Takes coins without loading game. Freezes to the point of battery removal. Plz fix!                                       Fzaznbh                               \'
reviews.author: M thomas

reviews.title: fun but not 100 percent free
reviews.comment: Fun and love it but it says 100% free but its not u play to get to level 40 to play wealthy panda and u have to PAY to play it...u should pay tokens like the others.  And the charms u have to pay for too.
reviews.author: Jason K

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Has improved a lot. I love this game.
reviews.author: Christy Black

reviews.title: Galaxy tablet
reviews.comment: I have already sent a 4 star rating and asked a question but no ones responded back yet? I have this app on my galaxy phone and on my galaxy tablet but the game freezes up on the next ball called!!! Is this app not for my tablet? Plz let me know so I can uninstall it and play on my phone! Thanks
reviews.author: Mary Wetz

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: I do not like all the gifting why don\'t you give me credit for that instead of how many Facebook friends I have? I don\'t want to bother my friends with all the postings on Facebook
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Froze!
reviews.comment: I have contacted you. No responses. So, now I am changing my rating. And my comment. Just now I had 3 live action cards (=1500 coins) & ball call froze NOTHING else in app froze.
reviews.author: Harold Roberts

reviews.title: Lucky Bingo
reviews.comment: So wish that the ads which are  many would be for at least my device.This is a time consumer,   but cheeper than playing scratch tickets. About the same winning results. I do recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This Game is my favorite
reviews.comment: the last update fixed everything. Wonderful again.
reviews.author: Denise Sheehan

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: I love this app!  No more lag time. Totally addicted!
reviews.author: Andrea Williams

reviews.title: Reset
reviews.comment: Painfully slow bingo is not reseting. I haven\'t had a new card for two days.
reviews.author: Kristen Bray

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: I don\'t like that if you can\'t finish game u can\'t collect your rewards.  They should credit as u play and not only at the end!
reviews.author: Katie w

reviews.title: Update!
reviews.comment: Whatever was done to \"improve\" this game needs to be undone. I never had so many problems connecting. It shuts down, freezes, & causes me to waste coins, time, & doesn\'t count my bingo\'s when I actually get in to play. I was so addicted to this game however with all the issues it makes it almost impossible to play. So frustrating! Please fix asap! Thank you
reviews.author: Jamie Burkhart

reviews.title: Need more coins
reviews.comment: Sometimes you have to wait a day to get free coins...I always used up my money but in the morning....I have no coins.
reviews.author: Angel Gaspar

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just amazing I wish it was played to win real money though
reviews.author: Cortney Donohoe

reviews.title: PSB missing...
reviews.comment: Painfully slow bingo game for 7/6 is missing. Tried checking in multiple times, still not there. Says I\'ve already checked in, but the last game showing is 7/5. Where\'s the new game??
reviews.author: Sarah Kabler-Vincent

reviews.title: False info!
reviews.comment: It says you can download different apps and get coins but it does not give them to you... This game sucks! please fix
reviews.author: Brittany Sheats
